mapper.select: select f.fishName, buy.location, f.unit, buy.total from fishList f, (select fishName, location, sum(price) as total from buylist b group by fishName, location) buy where f.fishName = buy.fishName order by buy.total desc

select f.fishName, buy.location, f.unit, buy.total from fishList f, (select fishName, location, sum(price) as total from buylist b group by fishName, location) buy where f.fishName = buy.fishName and f.SEASONINFO like '%' || #{season} || '%' order by buy.total desc
